description: Famille Rose; globular body with handles and spout in form of crouching budhist lions on each side; 5 circle panels in Linglong technique pierced and decorated enamels with iron red and green borders as chrysanthemum opening its petals; pierced decoration techinque on cover with bird finial
dimension: H.5-1/2 x W.6-1/2 x D.4 in. (overall)
title: Teapot
